Articles.Content: I don't know if anyone on this forum plays Spore, but there is a company that will take any creature that you make in the game and create a little figurine for it. Maybe Squad could do something like that with the rockets people build. I know that it's a long shot and even if it does happen it's miles down the road, but it's just a suggestion.
I've thought about buying some tubing and recreating some of my rockets as flyable model rockets.

I've thought about buying some tubing and recreating some of my rockets as flyable model rockets.

New orderables! A flyable model ksp rocket with a parachuting Kerbal! Each rocket has a 50% chance of parachute malfunction! Collect them all! Collect all of the broken pieces! It's fun!

Come on, Squad, you know it would be great. I know I would buy six.

I don't know if anyone on this forum plays Spore, but there is a company that will take any creature that you make in the game and create a little figurine for it. Maybe Squad could do something like that with the rockets people build. I know that it's a long shot and even if it does happen it's miles down the road, but it's just a suggestion.

Yes, I've played SPORE before and I love the game and creative community, though I believe it's dying off.. Shame.. I was actually REALLY good at the vehicle editors.

And yes, I would be like asfosdgksajdgakjdg GIVE NOW if this were to happen.

Yes, I've played SPORE before and I love the game and creative community, though I believe it's dying off.. Shame.. I was actually REALLY good at the vehicle editors.

And yes, I would be like asfosdgksajdgakjdg GIVE NOW if this were to happen.

It did die off right when the Spaceship section got filled with flying furry heads thats main purpose was like facebook, thinking that people cared about what they did yesterday. Now, I do enjoy spore, but it could have been so much more, but EA obviously. Part of it was the idea that Maxis gave it trying to lean it toward the silly side, it could have easily been one of the greatest games i've ever played.

On topic: I also remember WoW doing something like this, instead of rockets it was a statue of your character, and I think it was a pre-order bonus for one of the expansions, dont quote me on that. I still very much like the idea of this.

Someone put basically this in the impossible/stupid suggestions thread but really I don't entirely agree with it. Sure, it's probably far off if it's ever going to happen, but we're in the age of 3D printing now! Inexpensive custom model building who's cost is based on mass and not complexity. Doesn't seem that farfetched.

It'd be pretty awesome if the rockets were compatible with model rocket motors.

Well, only if it'll fly straight...
I would so buy a Kerbal bobble-head. It'd sit on my computer and I'd love it forever and ever.
